AuthorDetails.Name: Dolba
AuthorDetails.Description: A web developer who became passionate about Umbraco

Title: Our.Umbraco.CookieConsent
Description: Our.Umbraco.CookieConsent is a package for adding a fully configurable cookie consent banner to your Umbraco site. It uses the Orestbida/CookieConsent library and includes an intuitive dashboard for customization of banner behavior, appearance, and translations.
